name: Speedway Manager 2
overview: Speedway Manager 2 is a management game of the Polish speedway league for up to four players. The main task of the player is the appropriate financial management of the club and win the championship. Income comes only from tickets, advertisements, radio and TV transmissions. The expenditure includes the purchase of motorcycles and tires, salaries of players and spending on gasoline. The match window shows all the races with points stats and allows to make a substitution. The player may turn on the top down side scrolling match animations. The driver is described by average score points in the match.
